Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Performance: Add frame-based enemy cache to Healer

Healer was calling get_nodes_in_group("enemies") twice per frame:
once in _find_most_damaged_ally() and once in _heal_nearby_enemies().

Now uses a frame-based cache that refreshes only once per frame,
reducing redundant scene tree queries.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
